entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore appears busy plotting his rise to power when he should have been mourning his mother and caring for his sister.

entities.name: gellert grindelwald
entities.description: Gellert Grindelwald is mentioned as someone Albus Dumbledore had a great new friendship with.

entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda is quoted in the text saying that she thinks Ariana's death caused the abrupt rupture between Dumbledore and Grindelwald.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is mentioned as someone who died, causing a shock to Gellert Grindelwald.

entities.name: chapter 22
entities.description: Chapter 22 is mentioned as the place where more information about Dumbledore and Grindelwald's legendary duel can be found.

relationships.description: Albus Dumbledore and Gellert Grindelwald had a great new friendship.
Gellert Grindelwald visited Bathilda after Ariana's death.
Ariana's death caused the abrupt rupture between Albus Dumbledore and Gellert Grindelwald.
